channel.title: Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mono County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End CA-266 North
item.description: End CA-266 north at the California-Nevada State Line. CA-266 continues into Nevada as NV-264.

item.title: CA-266 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-266 north. Distance to Dyer (Nevada) and US-6 junction.

item.title: CA-266 North at CA-168 West
item.description: CA-266 North at CA-168 West to Big Pine. The White Mountains are in the background.

item.title: CA-266 North Approaching CA-168
item.description: CA-266 North approaching CA-168 in Mono County.

item.title: CA-266 North Approaching CA-168
item.description: CA-266 North approaching CA-168 in Mono County. Use CA-168 West to Big Pine; continue north on CA-266 for Dyer (Nevada).

item.title: CA-266 North - Next Services
item.description: Distance to next services on CA-266 north. Dyer (Nevada) - 19 Miles. Big Pine (via CA-168) - 42 Miles.

item.title: CA-266 North - Mono County
item.description: CA-266 north in Mono County. Speed Limit 65 MPH.

item.title: Welcome To California - CA-266 North
item.description: Welcome To California on CA-266 North. Taken at the Nevada-California State line. The mile marker for NV-266 is in the foreground. The state line is at the cattle guard.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Nevada State Line, Carson City, and Reno on US-395 north.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89
item.description: US-395 North at CA-89 North. Turn left on CA-89 for Markleeville.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-89
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-89 to Markleeville and Monitor Pass. Monitor Pass was open when this picture was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Topaz, Nevada State Line, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North - Walker
item.description: Entering Walker on US-395 north.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance maker on US-395 north. Distance to Walker, Coleville, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-108
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-108 - Mono County.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-108
item.description: US-395 North approaching CA-108/Sonora. Sonora Pass was closed when this picture was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Sonora Jct. - CA-108, Walker, and Reno (Nevada). Begin scenic route.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-182
item.description: US-395 north at CA-182 in Bridgeport. Turn right for Bridgeport Reservoir and Yerington (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada). Turn left to continue north on US-395.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-270
item.description: US-395 South Approaching CA-270 east to Bodie. CA-270 east was closed at the time this photo was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Conway Summit
item.description: Conway Summit - Elevation 8138 Feet on US-395 north. Conway Summit is the highest point on US-395.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Bodie Road - Jct. CA-270, Bridgeport - Jct. CA-182, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass is closed when this picture was taken.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395 North
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 North in Mono County. Turn left (across the divided highway) for US-395 south to Bishop; left for US-395 north to Lee Vining. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 junction. Turn right for US-395 North/CA-120 West. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 in Mono County. Turn left for US-395 south to Bishop; left for US-395 north/(CA-120 west) to Lee Vining. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-120 west. Distance to Jct. US-395, Lee Vining, and Yosemite.

item.title: CA-120 West at Benton Crossing Road
item.description: CA-120 West at Benton Crossing Road in Mono County. Turn left for Benton Cross Road south to Crowley Lake and US-395; continue straight for CA-120 West to Tioga Pass and US-395.

item.title: CA-120 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-120 west. Distance to US-395, Lee Vining, and Yosemite. CA-120 is open to US-395. This stretch of CA-120 is closed during the winter months.

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: US-6 West - California State Agricultural Inspection
item.description: US-6 west approaching the California State Agricultural Inspection Station at Benton. All traffic must stop for inspection.

item.title: US-6 West - Mono County
item.description: US-6 west in Mono County.

item.title: US-6 West - Welcome to California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-6 west. Taken at the Nevada-California state line. The cattle guard marks the actual state line.

item.title: CA-120 West - Mono County
item.description: CA-120 west in Mono County. Mono Lake is in the background of the photo.

item.title: CA-89 North - Begin Scenic Route
item.description: Begin Scenic Route on CA-89 north.

item.title: CA-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on CA-89 north. Distance to CA-4 Jct., Markleeville, and Lake Tahoe.

item.title: US-395 South - Sierra Pass Information
item.description: Sierra pass closure information on US-395 south. Information for Sonora Pass (CA-108) and Tioga Pass (CA-120). At the time this photo was taken both passes were open.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 north to Markleeville. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 south at CA-89 North to Markleeville and Monitor Pass. Monitor Pass was open when this was taken. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South - California Agricultural Inspection Station
item.description: US-395 South approaching California Agricultural Inspection - Topaz Border Station. All southbound traffic must stop for inspection.

item.title: US-395 South - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California / Mono County Line on US-395 south.

item.title: CA-167 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-167 east. Distance to Nevada State Line and Hawthorne (Nevada).

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 south to Bishop and Mammoth Lakes. Turn left for US-395 north to Lee Vining and Reno. Turn right to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Lee Vining; left for US-395 south to Bishop. Turn right on US-395 to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: CA-120 East - Mono County Line
item.description: Mono County Line on CA-120 east at Tioga Pass.

item.title: CA-120 East - Tioga Pass
item.description: First CA-120 shield after leaving Yosemite National Park at Tioga Pass.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-182
item.description: US-395 south at CA-182 in Bridgeport. When this picture was taken, US-395 was closed in the evenings north of Bridgeport, so northbound US-395 traffic had to use CA-182 to reach Reno and Carson City, hence the orange directional signs.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 south approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 South approaching CA-182 in Bridgeport.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-182
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-182 north to Yerrington (Nevada). Turn left to continue north on US-395.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-270
item.description: US-395 South Approaching CA-270 east to Bodie.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Bodie Road - Jct. CA-270, Bridgeport - Jct. CA-182, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North at CA-167
item.description: US-395 north at CA-167 east to Hawthorne (Nevada). Turn left for Lundy Lake.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-167
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-167 east to Hawthorne (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass was opened the day after this picture was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Jct. CA-120 in Lee Vining, Jct. CA-160 to Hawthorne, and Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-158
item.description: US-395 North Approaching CA-158 - June Lake Loop (north end).

item.title: US-395 North At CA-120 East
item.description: US-395 north at CA-120 east. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120 East
item.description: US-395 North Approaching CA-120 East to Benton. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-395 North - Mono County
item.description: Mono County Line on US-395 north.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distances to Jct. US-395 - Bishop, and Los Angeles.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Bishop and Independence. This is an older style distance marker which lists distances in miles and kilometers. These dual unit signs are scattered around California, although they tend to be older with button copy lettering.

item.title: End CA-120 East at US-6
item.description: End CA-120 east at US-6. Use US-6 west for Bishop; US-6 east for Tonopah (Nevada).

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-6 west approaching CA-120 west to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-6 West - California State Agricultural Inspection
item.description: US-6 west approaching the California State Agricultural Inspection Station at Benton. All traffic must stop for inspection. I was waved through on this day.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Jct. CA-120 West/Benton, Chalfant, and Jct. US-395/Bishop. This is the first distance marker on US-6 inside of California.

item.title: US-6 West - Welcome to California
item.description: Welcome to California on US-6 west. Taken at the Nevada-California state line. The cattle guard marks the actual state line.

item.title: CA-167 West at NV/CA Stateline
item.description: First SR-167 assurance marker after Nevada border

item.title: Distance Marker On CA-167 East
item.description: Distance marker to Hawthorne (NV) just east of US-395 junction

item.title: Distance Marker on US-395 South
item.description: Distance marker to CA-158 (June Lake)/CA-203 (Mammoth Lakes)/Los Angeles, just south of CA-120 east

item.title: Distance Marker on US-395 South
item.description: Distance marker to CA-158 (North), CA-120 East, and Los Angeles, just south of CA-120 West

item.title: End CA-167 West at US-395
item.description: Western end of CA-167 at US-395 to Lee Vining and Bridgeport

item.title: End CA-167 West at US-395
item.description: End CA-167 at US-395

item.title: US-395 Entrance at Crowley Lake
item.description: US-395 freeway entrance at Crowley Lake IC

item.title: US-395 South at CA-203
item.description: CA-203/Devils Postpile/Mammoth Lakes exit on US-395 south

item.title: US-395 South at CA-203
item.description: CA-203 to Mammoth Lakes and Devils Postpile National Monument, right lane

item.title: US-395 South at Crowley Lake
item.description: Crowley Lake/Hilton Creek exit on US-395 south

item.title: US-395 South CA-120 West
item.description: US-395 south at CA-120 west to Tioga Pass/Yosemite

item.title: US-395 South CA-158 Jct.
item.description: CA-158 junction (north) to June Lake

item.title: Welcome To California - CA-167 West
item.description: Welcome to California at Nevada border

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-359 North
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on California border. Welcome to Nevada is the blue on silver design.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Nevada, Carson City, and Reno on US-395 north in Topaz.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-89 North
item.description: Distance marker to Markleeville on US-395 north at CA-89 junction in Topaz. This is the southern end of CA-89.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-89
item.description: US-395 north at CA-89 junction to Markleeville and Monitor Pass in Topaz. Monitor Pass is closed when this was taken.
